channel.title: MoparCraft wild addition
channel.description:
First of all, I'm sure we can all thank Zuppers in his hard work in creating the plugin we're using today! ;)
[code] Done radius chat so you can only hear and talk to players close to you. configurable bounding box for wilderness x1,y1,x2,y2 disable chat being sent to players inside wild from outside wild disable pvp for players outside wild enable pvp for players inside wild disable lwc disable essentials.me disable essentials.msg disable essentials.home enable for everyone -tnt protect border slain messages disabled /wild - Teleports player randomly into the wild with no items- has a configerable cooldown and can only be used outside the wild with a cooldown [/code]
On top of this, the griefing rule has been substantially relaxed in the wild. So if you're looking for the perfect property home then perhaps the wild isn't the ideal location.
More detailed information on the mechanics and rules will be posted [url=http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/topic,550652.msg4035888.html#post_pvp]here[/url] in due time

item.title: MoparCraft wild addition
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:11, topic:457228”][quote author=kingmoney link=topic=560161.msg4098464#msg4098464 date=1347147754]
/wild idea is stupid suggest all pvp.
[/quote]You’re just too pussy to fight the real men on hardcore.

/wild idea is stupid suggest all pvp.

It’s actually a pretty decent idea. All PVP can be quite annoying and since it was disabled on moparcraft there must be a decent explanation for it.

It’s not necessarily annoying to everyone, it’s just that some people like it and some people don’t. It’s best to just have two worlds as there’s really no way of pleasing everyone. PvP at night seemed like a good idea once, but I don’t think people liked it because the plugin never worked properly…[/quote]
I meant it as an all PVP server with no limits whats so ever** And yeah you are right

Read full topic

[quote=“xxx123xxx, post:10, topic:457228”][quote author=kingmoney link=topic=560161.msg4098464#msg4098464 date=1347147754]
/wild idea is stupid suggest all pvp.
[/quote]

It’s actually a pretty decent idea. All PVP can be quite annoying and since it was disabled on moparcraft there must be a decent explanation for it.[/quote]
It’s not necessarily annoying to everyone, it’s just that some people like it and some people don’t. It’s best to just have two worlds as there’s really no way of pleasing everyone. PvP at night seemed like a good idea once, but I don’t think people liked it because the plugin never worked properly…

Read full topic

item.title: MoparCraft wild addition
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

First of all, I’m sure we can all thank Zuppers in his hard work in creating the plugin we’re using today! 

Done
radius chat so you can only hear and talk to players close to you.
configurable bounding box for wilderness x1,y1,x2,y2
disable chat being sent to players inside wild from outside wild
disable pvp for players outside wild
enable pvp for players inside wild
disable lwc
disable essentials.me
disable essentials.msg
disable essentials.home
enable for everyone -tnt
protect border
slain messages disabled
/wild - Teleports player randomly into the wild with no items- has a configerable cooldown and can only be used outside the wild with a cooldown

On top of this, the griefing rule has been substantially relaxed in the wild. So if you’re looking for the perfect property home then perhaps the wild isn’t the ideal location.

More detailed information on the mechanics and rules will be posted here in due time

Read full topic
